Items.Title: A Local Law to establish a program in relation to the employment of school bus drivers, attendants, dispatchers and mechanics by qualified employers.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Establish a program in relation to the employment of school bus drivers, attendants, dispatchers and mechanics by qualified employers.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and for the Governor to sign, legislation that would mandate employee safeguards for experienced bus drivers, attendants, dispatchers and mechanics as part of all current and future bus contracts.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Mandate employee safeguards for experienced bus drivers, attendants, dispatchers and mechanics as part of all current and future bus contracts.

Items.Title: A Local Law to establish a program in relation to the employment of school bus drivers, attendants, dispatchers and mechanics by qualified employers.
Items.ActionName: P-C Item Laid Over by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was P-C Item Laid Over by Comm
Items.MatterName: Establish a program in relation to the employment of school bus drivers, attendants, dispatchers and mechanics by qualified employers.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and for the Governor to sign, legislation that would mandate employee safeguards for experienced bus drivers, attendants, dispatchers and mechanics as part of all current and future bus contracts.
Items.ActionName: P-C Item Laid Over by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was P-C Item Laid Over by Comm
Items.MatterName: Mandate employee safeguards for experienced bus drivers, attendants, dispatchers and mechanics as part of all current and future bus contracts.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Speaker Mark-Viverito, Eugene, Miller and Cornegy
